SELECT 
    u.id as user_id,
    u.nome,
    u.nome_preferencia,
    COALESCE(u.cronotipo_detectado, NULL) as cronotipo_detectado
FROM usuarios u
WHERE u.token_acesso = $1 
  AND u.token_expira_em > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
LIMIT 1;

WITH periodo AS (
  SELECT
    CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 days' AS inicio,
    CURRENT_DATE                     AS fim
),
conversas_periodo AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conversas
  FROM usr_chat uc
  JOIN periodo p ON uc.data_conversa BETWEEN p.inicio AND p.fim
  WHERE uc.usuario_id = $1
),
sabotadores_periodo AS (
  SELECT
    us.sabotador_id,
    COUNT(*)                    AS total_deteccoes,
    COUNT(DISTINCT us.chat_id)  AS conversas_afetadas
  FROM usuarios_sabotadores us
  JOIN usr_chat uc ON uc.id = us.chat_id
  JOIN periodo p   ON uc.data_conversa BETWEEN p.inicio AND p.fim
  WHERE us.usuario_id = $1
  GROUP BY us.sabotador_id
),
sabotador_top AS (
  SELECT
    sp.sabotador_id,
    sp.total_deteccoes,
    sp.conversas_afetadas,
    MAX(us.apelido_personalizado) AS apelido_personalizado,
    MAX(us.contexto_principal)    AS contexto_principal,
    MAX(us.insight_atual)         AS insight_atual,
    MAX(us.contramedida_ativa)    AS contramedida_ativa,
    MAX(us.intensidade_media)     AS intensidade_media,
    MAX(us.atualizado_em)         AS ultima_atualizacao
  FROM sabotadores_periodo sp
  JOIN usuarios_sabotadores us
    ON us.usuario_id = $1
   AND us.sabotador_id = sp.sabotador_id
  GROUP BY sp.sabotador_id, sp.total_deteccoes, sp.conversas_afetadas
  ORDER BY sp.total_deteccoes DESC,
           sp.conversas_afetadas DESC,
           MAX(us.atualizado_em) DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  st.sabotador_id,
  sc.nome,
  sc.emoji,
  st.apelido_personalizado,
  st.total_deteccoes,
  cp.total_conversas,
  st.conversas_afetadas,
  st.contexto_principal,
  st.insight_atual,
  st.contramedida_ativa,
  st.intensidade_media
FROM sabotador_top st
JOIN sabotadores_catalogo sc ON sc.id = st.sabotador_id
CROSS JOIN conversas_periodo cp;

WITH periodo AS (
  SELECT
    CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' AS inicio,
    CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day'  AS fim_exclusivo
),
emocao_classificada AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LOWER(emocao_id) IN ('joy','trust','anticipation') THEN 'POSITIVA'
      WHEN LOWER(emocao_id) IN ('sadness','fear','anger','disgust') THEN 'NEGATIVA'
      WHEN LOWER(emocao_id) = 'surprise' THEN 'NEUTRA'
      ELSE 'NEUTRA'
    END AS categoria
  FROM usuarios_emocoes ue
  JOIN periodo p
    ON ue.detectado_em >= p.inicio
   AND ue.detectado_em <  p.fim_exclusivo
  WHERE ue.usuario_id = $1
    AND ue.intensidade >= 45
)
SELECT
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'POSITIVA') AS positivas,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEGATIVA') AS negativas,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEUTRA')   AS neutras,
  COUNT(*)                                       AS total,
  CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0
       THEN ROUND((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'POSITIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100, 1)
       ELSE 0 END AS percentual_positivas,
  CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0
       THEN ROUND((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEGATIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100, 1)
       ELSE 0 END AS percentual_negativas,
  CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0
       THEN ROUND((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEUTRA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100, 1)
       ELSE 0 END AS percentual_neutras,
  CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'NEUTRA'
    WHEN ( (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'POSITIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100
         - (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEGATIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100 ) > 20
         THEN 'POSITIVA'
    WHEN ( (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'NEGATIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100
         - (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE categoria = 'POSITIVA')::numeric / COUNT(*)::numeric) * 100 ) > 20
         THEN 'NEGATIVA'
    ELSE 'NEUTRA'
  END AS resultado_panas
FROM emocao_classificada;

WITH periodo AS (
  SELECT CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 days' AS inicio,
         CURRENT_DATE                     AS fim
),
dias AS (
  SELECT generate_series(inicio, fim, INTERVAL '1 day')::date AS data
  FROM periodo
),

registros AS (
  SELECT uhe.*
  FROM public.usuarios_humor_energia uhe
  JOIN periodo p ON uhe.data_registro BETWEEN p.inicio AND p.fim
  WHERE uhe.usuario_id = $1
),
ultimos_por_dia AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (data_registro)
         data_registro, hora_registro, detectado_em, humor_dia, energia_nivel,
         periodo_dia, variacao_humor, variacao_energia, justificativa_humor,
         confianca_analise, chat_id
  FROM registros
  ORDER BY data_registro, detectado_em DESC, hora_registro DESC
),
linha_base AS (
  SELECT d.data AS data_registro,
         AVG(r.humor_dia)::numeric(4,2)     AS humor_medio_dia,
         AVG(r.energia_nivel)::numeric(4,2) AS energia_media_dia
  FROM dias d
  LEFT JOIN registros r ON r.data_registro = d.data
  GROUP BY d.data
),
emocao_conversa AS (
  SELECT ue.chat_id,
         ep.nome AS emocao_nome,
         ep.emoji,
         ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
           PARTITION BY ue.chat_id
           ORDER BY ue.intensidade DESC NULLS LAST,
                    ue.detectado_em DESC NULLS LAST,
                    ue.criado_em DESC NULLS LAST
         ) AS ordem
  FROM public.usuarios_emocoes ue
  JOIN periodo p ON COALESCE(ue.detectado_em, p.fim) BETWEEN p.inicio AND p.fim
  LEFT JOIN public.emocoes_plutchik ep ON ep.id = ue.emocao_id
  WHERE ue.usuario_id = $1
),
conversas AS (
  SELECT uc.id AS chat_id,
         uc.data_conversa,
         uc.horario_inicio,
         uc.horario_fim,
         uc.total_interactions,
         uc.status,
         ec.emocao_nome,
         ec.emoji
  FROM public.usr_chat uc
  JOIN periodo p ON uc.data_conversa BETWEEN p.inicio AND p.fim
  LEFT JOIN emocao_conversa ec ON ec.chat_id = uc.id AND ec.ordem = 1
  WHERE uc.usuario_id = $1
)

SELECT
  lb.data_registro                                    AS data,
  lb.humor_medio_dia                                  AS humor_medio,
  lb.energia_media_dia                                AS energia_media,
  up.humor_dia                                        AS pico_diario,
  up.variacao_humor,
  up.variacao_energia,
  up.periodo_dia,
  up.justificativa_humor,
  up.confianca_analise,
  conv.chat_id,
  conv.horario_inicio,
  conv.horario_fim,
  conv.total_interactions,
  conv.status,
  conv.emocao_nome,
  conv.emoji
FROM linha_base lb
LEFT JOIN ultimos_por_dia up
  ON up.data_registro = lb.data_registro
LEFT JOIN conversas conv
  ON conv.data_conversa = lb.data_registro
ORDER BY lb.data_registro;

SELECT 
    id,
    tipo,
    categoria,
    titulo,
    descricao,
    icone,
    prioridade,
    criado_em as data_criacao
FROM insights
WHERE usuario_id = $1
  AND ativo = true
ORDER BY 
    CASE prioridade 
        WHEN 'alta' THEN 1 
        WHEN 'media' THEN 2 
        WHEN 'baixa' THEN 3 
    END,
    criado_em DESC;

SELECT 
    pb.usuario_id,
    COALESCE(pb.openness::text, 'null') as openness,
    COALESCE(pb.conscientiousness::text, 'null') as conscientiousness,
    COALESCE(pb.extraversion::text, 'null') as extraversion,
    COALESCE(pb.agreeableness::text, 'null') as agreeableness,
    COALESCE(pb.neuroticism::text, 'null') as neuroticism,
    COALESCE(pb.confiabilidade::text, 'null') as confiabilidade,
    COALESCE(pb.perfil_primario, 'null') as perfil_primario,
    COALESCE(pb.perfil_secundario, 'null') as perfil_secundario
FROM perfis_big_five pb
WHERE pb.usuario_id = $1;

WITH emocoes_semana AS (
    SELECT 
        emocao_id,
        SUM(intensidade) as intensidade_total
    FROM usuarios_emocoes
    WHERE usuario_id = $1
      AND detectado_em >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
    GROUP BY emocao_id
)
SELECT 
    json_build_object(
        'alegria', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'joy'), 0),
        'confianca', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'trust'), 0),
        'medo', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'fear'), 0),
        'surpresa', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'surprise'), 0),
        'tristeza', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'sadness'), 0),
        'angustia', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'disgust'), 0),
        'raiva', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'anger'), 0),
        'expectativa', COALESCE((SELECT intensidade_total FROM emocoes_semana WHERE emocao_id = 'anticipation'), 0)
    )::text as emocoes_contagem;

WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    usuario_id,
    data_registro,
    hora_registro,
    detectado_em,
    humor_dia
  FROM usuarios_humor_energia
  WHERE usuario_id = $1
    AND data_registro BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 days' AND CURRENT_DATE
),
stats AS (
  SELECT
    AVG(humor_dia) AS humor_medio,
    COUNT(*)      AS conversas_total
  FROM base
),
ultimo AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM base
  ORDER BY data_registro DESC,
           hora_registro DESC NULLS LAST,
           detectado_em DESC NULLS LAST
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  ultimo.humor_dia                                       AS humor_atual,
  ROUND(stats.humor_medio::numeric, 2)                   AS humor_medio_7d,
  CASE
    WHEN stats.humor_medio > 0
      THEN ROUND(((ultimo.humor_dia - stats.humor_medio) / stats.humor_medio) * 100, 1)
    ELSE NULL
  END                                                    AS diferenca_percentual,
  ultimo.data_registro                                   AS ultima_data,
  ultimo.hora_registro                                   AS ultima_hora,
  COALESCE(stats.conversas_total, 0)                     AS conversas_total
FROM ultimo
CROSS JOIN stats;

WITH base AS (
  SELECT $1::uuid AS usuario_id
),
snapshot AS (
  SELECT g.*
  FROM public.gamificacao g
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = g.usuario_id
  ORDER BY COALESCE(g.atualizado_em, g.criado_em) DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
stats AS (
  SELECT
    uq.usuario_id,
    COALESCE(SUM(uq.xp_concedido), 0) AS xp_total,
    COALESCE(SUM(uq.xp_concedido) FILTER (
      WHERE uq.concluido_em IS NOT NULL
        AND uq.concluido_em::date = CURRENT_DATE
    ), 0) AS xp_total_hoje,
    COALESCE(MAX(uq.progresso_atual) FILTER (WHERE qc.gatilho_tipo = 'total_conversas'), 0) AS total_conversas,
    COALESCE(MAX(uq.progresso_atual) FILTER (WHERE qc.gatilho_tipo = 'total_reflexoes'), 0) AS total_reflexoes,
    COALESCE(MAX(uq.atualizado_em)::date, NULL) AS ultima_conversa_data
  FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
  JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
  GROUP BY uq.usuario_id
),
daily_status AS (
  SELECT
    dq.status AS status_norm,
    dq.progresso_percentual AS progresso_norm,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(qc.descricao, ''), qc.titulo) AS descricao_norm,
    dq.referencia_data AS data_norm
  FROM (
    SELECT
      uq.*,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY qc.codigo
        ORDER BY uq.referencia_data DESC NULLS LAST, uq.atualizado_em DESC NULLS LAST
      ) AS ordem
    FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
    JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
    JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
    WHERE qc.categoria = 'habit_daily'
      AND uq.referencia_data = CURRENT_DATE
  ) dq
  JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = dq.quest_id
  WHERE dq.ordem = 1
  LIMIT 1
),
conquistas_completas AS (
  SELECT jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'id', qc.codigo,
      'nome', qc.titulo,
      'emoji', '游끥',
      'xp_bonus', qc.xp_recompensa,
      'categoria', qc.categoria,
      'desbloqueada_em', uq.concluido_em
    )
    ORDER BY uq.concluido_em DESC NULLS LAST
  ) AS conquistas
  FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
  JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
  WHERE uq.status = 'completa'
    AND qc.categoria <> 'habit_daily'
),
habitos_snapshot AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'quest_id', latest.id,
      'codigo', latest.codigo,
      'titulo', latest.titulo,
      'status', latest.status,
      'vence_em', latest.referencia_data,
      'progresso_atual', latest.progresso_atual,
      'progresso_meta', latest.progresso_meta,
      'atualizado_em', latest.atualizado_em
    )
    ORDER BY
      CASE latest.status
        WHEN 'completa' THEN 0
        WHEN 'ativa' THEN 1
        WHEN 'pendente' THEN 2
        ELSE 3
      END,
      latest.codigo
  ), '[]'::jsonb) AS itens
  FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (qc.codigo)
      uq.id,
      qc.codigo,
      qc.titulo,
      uq.status,
      uq.referencia_data,
      uq.progresso_atual,
      uq.progresso_meta,
      uq.atualizado_em
    FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
    JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
    JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
    WHERE qc.categoria = 'habit_daily'
    ORDER BY qc.codigo, uq.atualizado_em DESC NULLS LAST, uq.id DESC
  ) latest
),
categorias_evolucao AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'codigo', stats.categoria,
      'nome', initcap(replace(stats.categoria, '_', ' ')),
      'total_conquistas', stats.total_conquistas,
      'ultima_atualizacao', stats.ultima_atualizacao,
      'ultima_conclusao', stats.ultima_conclusao
    )
    ORDER BY stats.categoria
  ), '[]'::jsonb) AS itens
  FROM (
    SELECT
      qc.categoria,
      COUNT(*) AS total_conquistas,
      MAX(uq.atualizado_em) AS ultima_atualizacao,
      MAX(uq.concluido_em) AS ultima_conclusao
    FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
    JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
    JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
    WHERE uq.status = 'completa'
    GROUP BY qc.categoria
  ) stats
),
fallback AS (
  SELECT
    0::int AS xp_total,
    400::int AS xp_proximo_nivel,
    1::int AS nivel_atual,
    'N칤vel 1'::varchar AS titulo_nivel,
    0::int AS streak_conversas_dias,
    false::boolean AS streak_protecao_usada,
    NULL::date AS streak_protecao_resetada_em,
    NULL::date AS ultima_conversa_data,
    0::int AS melhor_streak,
    'pendente'::varchar AS quest_diaria_status,
    0::int AS quest_diaria_progresso,
    'Complete sua conversa di치ria'::text AS quest_diaria_descricao,
    CURRENT_DATE AS quest_diaria_data,
    0::int AS quest_streak_dias,
    '[]'::jsonb AS conquistas_desbloqueadas,
    '[]'::jsonb AS conquistas_proximas,
    0::int AS total_conversas,
    0::int AS total_reflexoes,
    0::int AS total_xp_ganho_hoje,
    NULL::uuid AS ultima_conquista_id,
    NULL::timestamp AS ultima_conquista_data,
    NOW()::timestamp AS criado_em,
    NOW()::timestamp AS atualizado_em
),
xp_valor AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(snap.xp_total, st.xp_total, fb.xp_total) AS xp_total
  FROM fallback fb
  LEFT JOIN snapshot snap ON TRUE
  LEFT JOIN stats st ON TRUE
  LIMIT 1
),
nivel_atual AS (
  SELECT gn.*
  FROM public.gamificacao_niveis gn
  JOIN xp_valor xv ON xv.xp_total >= gn.xp_minimo
  ORDER BY gn.xp_minimo DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
nivel_proximo AS (
  SELECT gn.*
  FROM public.gamificacao_niveis gn
  JOIN xp_valor xv ON gn.xp_minimo > xv.xp_total
  ORDER BY gn.xp_minimo
  LIMIT 1
),
proximas_conquistas AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'id', pr.codigo,
      'nome', pr.nome,
      'emoji', '游',
      'xp_bonus', pr.xp_recompensa,
      'categoria', pr.categoria,
      'status', pr.status,
      'progresso_percentual', pr.progresso_percentual,
      'progresso_atual', pr.progresso_atual,
      'progresso_meta', pr.progresso_meta
    )
    ORDER BY
      CASE pr.status WHEN 'ativa' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
      pr.ordem_inicial NULLS LAST,
      pr.ativado_em DESC NULLS LAST
  ), '[]'::jsonb) AS conquistas
  FROM (
    SELECT
      qc.codigo,
      qc.titulo AS nome,
      qc.categoria,
      qc.xp_recompensa,
      uq.status,
      uq.progresso_percentual,
      uq.progresso_atual,
      uq.progresso_meta,
      qc.ordem_inicial,
      uq.ativado_em
    FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
    JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
    JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
    WHERE qc.categoria <> 'habit_daily'
      AND uq.status <> 'completa'
  ) pr
)
SELECT jsonb_build_object(
  'xp_total', COALESCE(snap.xp_total, st.xp_total, fb.xp_total),
  'xp_proximo_nivel', COALESCE(snap.xp_proximo_nivel, np.xp_minimo, fb.xp_proximo_nivel),
  'nivel_atual', COALESCE(snap.nivel_atual, na.nivel, fb.nivel_atual),
  'titulo_nivel', COALESCE(snap.titulo_nivel, na.titulo, fb.titulo_nivel),
  'streak_conversas_dias', COALESCE(snap.streak_conversas_dias, fb.streak_conversas_dias),
  'streak_protecao_usada', COALESCE(snap.streak_protecao_usada, fb.streak_protecao_usada),
  'streak_protecao_resetada_em', COALESCE(snap.streak_protecao_resetada_em, fb.streak_protecao_resetada_em),
  'ultima_conversa_data', COALESCE(snap.ultima_conversa_data, st.ultima_conversa_data, fb.ultima_conversa_data),
  'melhor_streak', COALESCE(snap.melhor_streak, fb.melhor_streak),
  'quest_diaria_status', COALESCE(daily_status.status_norm, snap.quest_diaria_status, fb.quest_diaria_status),
  'quest_diaria_progresso', COALESCE(daily_status.progresso_norm, snap.quest_diaria_progresso, fb.quest_diaria_progresso),
  'quest_diaria_descricao', COALESCE(daily_status.descricao_norm, snap.quest_diaria_descricao, fb.quest_diaria_descricao),
  'quest_diaria_data', COALESCE(daily_status.data_norm, snap.quest_diaria_data, fb.quest_diaria_data),
  'quest_streak_dias', COALESCE(snap.quest_streak_dias, fb.quest_streak_dias),
  'habitos_ativos', COALESCE(snap.habitos_ativos, habitos_snapshot.itens, '[]'::jsonb),
  'conquistas_desbloqueadas', COALESCE(snap.conquistas_desbloqueadas, conquistas_completas.conquistas, fb.conquistas_desbloqueadas),
  'conquistas_proximas', COALESCE(proximas_conquistas.conquistas, fb.conquistas_proximas),
  'categorias_evolucao', COALESCE(categorias_evolucao.itens, '[]'::jsonb),
  'total_conversas', COALESCE(snap.total_conversas, st.total_conversas, fb.total_conversas),
  'total_reflexoes', COALESCE(snap.total_reflexoes, st.total_reflexoes, fb.total_reflexoes),
  'total_xp_ganho_hoje', COALESCE(snap.total_xp_ganho_hoje, st.xp_total_hoje, fb.total_xp_ganho_hoje),
  'ultima_conquista_id', COALESCE(snap.ultima_conquista_id, fb.ultima_conquista_id),
  'ultima_conquista_data', COALESCE(snap.ultima_conquista_data, fb.ultima_conquista_data),
  'ultima_atualizacao', COALESCE(snap.atualizado_em, fb.atualizado_em),
  'criado_em', COALESCE(snap.criado_em, fb.criado_em)
) AS gamificacao
FROM base
CROSS JOIN fallback fb
LEFT JOIN snapshot snap ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN stats st ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN daily_status ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN conquistas_completas ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN habitos_snapshot ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN categorias_evolucao ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN proximas_conquistas ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN nivel_atual na ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN nivel_proximo np ON TRUE;

WITH base AS (
  SELECT $1::uuid AS usuario_id
),
gamificacao_estado AS (
  SELECT g.xp_total, g.nivel_atual, g.titulo_nivel
  FROM public.gamificacao g
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = g.usuario_id
  ORDER BY COALESCE(g.atualizado_em, g.criado_em) DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
xp_somado AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(SUM(uq.xp_concedido), 0) AS xp_total_quests
  FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
),
xp_total AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(g.xp_total, qs.xp_total_quests, 0) AS xp_total
  FROM gamificacao_estado g
  FULL JOIN xp_somado qs ON TRUE
),
nivel_atual AS (
  SELECT gn.*
  FROM public.gamificacao_niveis gn
  JOIN xp_total xt ON xt.xp_total >= gn.xp_minimo
  ORDER BY gn.xp_minimo DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
proximo_nivel AS (
  SELECT gn.*
  FROM public.gamificacao_niveis gn
  JOIN xp_total xt ON gn.xp_minimo > xt.xp_total
  ORDER BY gn.xp_minimo
  LIMIT 1
),
desafios AS (
  SELECT
    uq.id AS usuario_quest_id,
    qc.titulo,
    qc.categoria,
    qc.xp_recompensa,
    uq.status,
    uq.progresso_percentual,
    uq.progresso_atual,
    uq.progresso_meta,
    uq.ativado_em,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      ORDER BY
        CASE uq.status WHEN 'ativa' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
        uq.progresso_percentual DESC,
        qc.ordem_inicial NULLS LAST,
        uq.ativado_em DESC
    ) AS ordem
  FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
  JOIN public.quest_catalogo qc ON qc.id = uq.quest_id
  JOIN base ON base.usuario_id = uq.usuario_id
  WHERE uq.status IN ('pendente', 'ativa')
    AND qc.categoria <> 'habit_daily'
),
desafios_top AS (
  SELECT jsonb_agg(
    jsonb_build_object(
      'usuario_quest_id', d.usuario_quest_id,
      'titulo', d.titulo,
      'categoria', d.categoria,
      'xp_recompensa', d.xp_recompensa,
      'status', d.status,
      'progresso_percentual', d.progresso_percentual,
      'progresso_atual', d.progresso_atual,
      'progresso_meta', d.progresso_meta
    )
    ORDER BY d.ordem
  ) AS desafios
  FROM desafios d
  WHERE d.ordem <= 5
)
SELECT jsonb_build_object(
  'xp_total', xt.xp_total,
  'nivel_atual', COALESCE(na.nivel, g.nivel_atual),
  'titulo_atual', COALESCE(g.titulo_nivel, na.titulo),
  'proximo_nivel', CASE
    WHEN pn.nivel IS NULL THEN NULL
    ELSE jsonb_build_object(
      'nivel', pn.nivel,
      'titulo', pn.titulo,
      'xp_minimo', pn.xp_minimo,
      'xp_restante', GREATEST(pn.xp_minimo - xt.xp_total, 0),
      'descricao', pn.descricao
    )
  END,
  'desafios', COALESCE(dt.desafios, '[]'::jsonb)
) AS proxima_jornada
FROM xp_total xt
LEFT JOIN gamificacao_estado g ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN nivel_atual na ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN proximo_nivel pn ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN desafios_top dt ON TRUE;
